code: const API_URL='http://localhost:5000/api';export const submitImage=async formData=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/submit`,{method:'POST',body:formData});return response.json();};export const getMarketData=async()=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/market`);return response.json();};export const sendChatMessage=async message=>{const response=await fetch(`${API_URL}/chat`,{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({message})});const data=await response.json();return data.response;};
